name: Kenneth Zimny
intro: Frontend-focused web developer with a strong foundation in modern JavaScript frameworks, user interface design, and performance optimization. Proven experience building secure, scalable web applications using tools like React, Next.js, and AEM. Personal projects involving C++ and embedded systems reflect a growing interest in low-level programming and hardware integration. Currently exploring opportunities that bridge modern frontend development with embedded technologies while continuing to deliver best-in-class web experiences.
